# transform

**Instance Property**

The transform to apply to the text before displaying it.

## Declaration

```swift
var transform: TVMediaItemContentConfiguration.TextProperties.TextTransform { get set }
```

## Configuring Text Properties

- **font**: The font for the text.
- **color**: The color of the text.
- **TVMediaItemContentConfiguration.TextProperties.TextTransform**: Constants that specify the transform to apply to the text.
